name: YOU DON'T KNOW JACK TELEVISION
description: No, this is not a video of the YDKJ TV show that aired on ABC in 2001. It’s the YDKJ PC game with trivia all about TV shows! Fans of host Josh "Schmitty" Schmitstinstein will love this walk down boob-tube memory lane. If you thought all those hours of watching TV were good for nothing, then YOU DON’T KNOW JACK… Television!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 500 MHz processor or faster Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 640 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: The game runs at 640x480 max resolution.  Manually adjust your Desktop resolution if you want the game to fill the screen.

reviews.review_text: Loved playing YDKJ back in my youth, but it seems the us versions of it are a tad too american for me as a German. Hence I don't know a thing, and am reduced to guessing all the time xD Still nice for its nostalgic feeling and humor. Got all YDKJ games very cheap during the sale in a bundle, so it isn't worth complaining about the culture barriere. Overall, it is a nice game for now and then, but nothing special.   For this game in particular, you better know everything about ♥♥♥-old tv-shows, or you will fail as much as I did xD
Very entertaining and VERY hard! This is no fluff trivia game. The questions tip both sides of the scale... I found it quite a challenge!
If you don't know anything about old TV I would not reccomend this game.
